cmb:
MANA COST: 75/75/75/75
COOLDOWN: 6
desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
name: ursa_earthshock

cmb:
MANA COST: 45/55/65/75
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
notes:
Overpower grants maximum increased attack speed.
Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.
lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
name: ursa_overpower

attrib:
RESET TIME: 15
RESET TIME (ROSHAN): 6
DAMAGE PER ATTACK: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
desc: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
name: ursa_fury_swipes

cmb:
MANA COST: 0/0/0
COOLDOWN: 25
desc: Ursa goes into a frenzy, gaining a percentage of his current health as bonus damage. Lasts 15 seconds.
lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
name: ursa_enrage
